author: Tim Wyatt, Tim Wyatt
title: UK weather forecast: Warm and sunny weather set to continue as lockdown enters fifth week
description: No respite in summery conditions for those struggling while cooped up at home
content:
There is no end in sight of the warm and sunny weather currently tempting Britons locked down in their homes, with temperatures expected to soar into the mid-20s again by the middle of the week.
The government and police spent much of the Easter break urging… [+21459 chars]
